title: Any new of Avicus Official Tournament 0_0

replies.body:
Some in sight into what's happening.
  • Officials are meeting next weekend to finalise maps, bracket etc.
  • Refs and Advisor training dates.
That's basically what we need to work on. Fouled has done brilliant work with maps. Once he finalises a map pool, we'll start working out dates.
